body.name: Perlegear Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 26-65 inch TVs, TV Bracket Supports Swivel Articulating Level Extension Tilt Arms, Max VESA 400x400mm up to 99lbs, 16" Wood Studs, PGMFK4
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 9 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 9 mins
features: Full Motion TV Mount Compatibility - Our articulating tv mount Fits most 26"-65" flat curved LCD LED QLED OLED 4K TVs weighing up to 99lbs(most customers go for this 50 inch tv wall mount for their 40 42 43 45 46 48 49 50 55 60 65 inch tvs with VESA 100x100 to 400x400mm), compatible with samsung, sony, tcl, panasonic, thomson, toshiba, sharp, lg, philips, JVC etc TV. Please check the VESA pattern, weight, size of your TV before purchasing.

Upgrade Your Viewing: Our 26-65 inch TV wall mount tilts -15°/+5°, swivels +/-45° (max swivel angle depends on TV size) and level adjusts +/-3° for maximum viewing flexibility. Easily customize your TV watching experience to find the most comfortable and healthiest viewing position.The strong articulating arm provides a smooth 15.2" extension and retract back to 3.2" for saving space.

Height Adjustable TV Brackets for 65 inch TVs: With 3 levels height setting design of 42 inch tv mount wall brackets, you can adjust the height of the TV after this 42 tv mount is installed, so you can get the most comfortable viewing position and better viewing experience.

Fast and Easy Installtion - Comes with all the required mounting hardware needed, a detailed English graphical installation guide and video that is actually useful which helps you to install this full motion TV wall mount without any hassle. This tv mount 50 inch can be mounted on brick wall, concrete wall and 8"12"16" wood studs.
Quick-respond Custumer Service - Whatever questions you have, please feel free to contact us. We are always providing professional customer service before and after sales with quick response.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product came with great and easy to follow instructions, it included all the hardware required for the installation. It’s sturdy and holds the TV really well. Overall satisfied with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install and great wall mount
reviews.reviewText: I am extremely satisfied with the Perlegear Full Motion TV Wall Mount! This product has completely transformed my TV viewing experience.The full-motion design allows me to adjust my TV in any direction, providing the perfect viewing angle from any corner of the room. It's effortless to tilt, swivel, and extend the TV.The build quality is top-notch, and I feel confident that my TV is securely mounted to the wall. The heavy-duty materials used in the construction inspire trust and ensure the TV stays in place without any wobbling or instability.Installation was surprisingly easy, thanks to the clear instructions and included hardware. It took no time at all to set up the wall mount, saving me both time and frustration.Additionally, the slim profile of the mount keeps the TV close to the wall, creating a sleek and clean look that enhances the overall aesthetics of my living room.Overall, the Perlegear Full Motion TV Wall Mount is a fantastic investment. It offers excellent flexibility, robust construction, and a user-friendly installation process. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking to upgrade their TV setup and make the most out of their viewing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Useful!
reviews.reviewText: This product is great. I use it for my 55” TV and it’s super sturdy and smooth. It was easy to instal and comes with extra set of screws. Mounting is adjustable and moves easily to make adjustments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. This wall mount seems to be made to last. Feels strong and sturdy. Tv was an older model, and fit perfectly and is holding strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent product, fairly sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: This product is easy to use and install. My only complaint is that some of the edges are sharp enough to cut yourself. (which I did) I wish it would tilt down more than it does. Otherwise it's a fairly good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This mount was easy to install. Love it it swivels left to right. Tilts up and down. The price was great as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have no negative comments about this wall mount. It is very sturdy and does what it is advertised to do very well. The only thing that could add to its utility would be extensions to provide more latitude in placement; i.e., so that it could be located between the wall studs if necessary to center the TV on a wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can anyone say Fantastic
reviews.reviewText: This product came well packaged with instructions that could make you feel like a pro. All the pieces were there and upon completion we were watching television from wherever we decided in the room. This is truly a full motion product. If I had another television that needed to be mounted I would purchase this again for sure. That said, I wish I would have found this product before I hung my other televisions ; ( Great purchase!!
